content.rendered:
CHECK OUT OUR

INTERNSHIPS & EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITIES

At Infinity Hospitality, our goal is to provide unique, unforgettable experiences for our clients and guests. We strive to offer the utmost customer service and to exceed our own standards of excellence again and again. We believe that when you work together, growth is possible. We believe that the city we call home is special and rich with history. Our heart is in the creation of unique Nashville experiences that preserve and pay tribute to the city’s roots.

If you're looking for a great place to work, join our team!

Event Staff

Infinity Hospitality Group is seeking reliable and dedicated Event Staff who have a real passion for providing next-level service at our venues, The Bell Tower and The Bridge Building. Event staff positions are all-encompassing roles, and every team member will be cross trained to fill whichever positions are needed for each event, including greeting, bartending, serving, […]

Learn More

Don't see what you're looking for? For general employment inquires, please contact us at HR@infinityhospitality.net.
